product_name: The North Face Lynx Sleeping Bag
long_description: Travel lighter during summer backpacking trips and other weight-sensitive pursuits with the packable, 40degF Lynx Sleeping Bag from The North Face. The regular-length bag weighs in under 2 lbs. Continuous-filament and cut-staple Heatseeker Pro(TM) polyester insulation maximizes thermal performance to keep you warm down to 40degF, for 3-season backpacking. Offset quilted bottom reduces cold spots where your body rests against the cool ground. Efficient design delivers optimal warmth without sacrificing compressibility. Draft collar and shaped hood help retain warmth. Pad loops give you a way to attach the bag to a sleeping pad (pad not included). The North Face Lynx Sleeping Bag comes with a compression sack and storage sack.
short_description: Travel lighter during summer backpacking trips and other weight-sensitive pursuits with the packable, 40degF Lynx Sleeping Bag from The North Face. The regular-length bag weighs in under 2 lbs.
